title: Essential Ghost Rider, Vol. 1
description: When orphaned stunt-show star Johnny Blaze discovers his adoptive father Crash Simpson is dying of a rare blood disease, he barters his immortal soul for a miracle cure. The trade-off ultimately leaves him bound to the demon Zarathos, and their melding of spirits would manifest itself every night in the form of Ghost Rider, the most supernatural super-hero of all Collects Marvel Spotlight #5-12, Ghost Rider #1-20 and Daredevil #138.
author: Roy Thomas
